This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: While following a "Satellite" with my night vision, I saw a bright flash, so I abandoned my target and stayed where I saw this flash, I then recorded 25 mins of steady flashing in space. The object was stationary. The stars were in rotation, this wasn't.
divs: sighting detailsi was following this "orb\satellite" high in the sky and at bottom of the screen i see this flash.. so i decided to stay on it with the cam.. i recorded over 25 mins of this steady flashing. the flash is about every 22 seconds between flashes. keep watching do not fast forward or you miss it. notice.. the stars rotate with the earths turn... yet the flash does not.... so.. what is it? any ideas? [youtube links moved to additional evidence section\tg] also, at the end of part two.. a huge "ufo" passes by, i follow it, but lost it.. then i lost my place with the flash, so i do not know when it stopped flashing.
